definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Vincent Scholar's Toys Gifts Manufacturing Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 汕頭市澄海區智多星玩具禮品有限公司。

sentences.english: The leader of the young goats, who wears a small bell on his neck.
sentences.chinese: 喜羊羊是青青草原上的智多星，脖子上有個小鈴鐺。

sentences.english: Zarqawi was called the "mastermind" of the insurgency in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 扎卡維被稱作是伊拉克暴軍中的“智多星”。

sentences.english: People call me the man of wiles , but that title must now belong to you.
sentences.chinese: 人們叫我智多星，可是現在這個稱號應該給你了。

definition: divine strategy and wonderful planning (idiom)/clever scheme/supremely clever in his schemes
to prophesy with supernatural accuracy (idiom)/to have an incredible foresight
(derog.) inept advisor/a good-for-nothing adviser/one who offers bad advice
well versed in letters and military technology (idiom); fine scholar and soldier/master of pen and sword
Wu Yong, character of 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], nicknamed Resourceful Star 智多星[Zhi4 duo1 xing1]
Liu Bei's five great generals in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, namely: Guan Yu 關羽|关羽, Zhang Fei 張飛|张飞, Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云, Ma Chao 馬超|马超, Huang Zhong 黃忠|黄忠
